EmailTemplate.name: SGP_BRD_16_JC_Lucky Draw Campaign.Email - Voucher Winner eDM.Email - Winner eDM
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! You have won a $100 Royal Sporting House voucher from Jacob’s Creek Australia Open 2017 nationwide campaign.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/index.php/email/emailWebview?mkt_tok=]]>.
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Congratulations!
You have been selected as one of the 15 winners who will receive a $100 Royal Sporting House voucher for your participation in the Jacob’s Creek Australia Open 2017 nationwide campaign.
Please proceed to collect your voucher from 8 August onwards till 7 October 2016 at our office with proof of identification, from Mondays-Fridays 9am to 5.30pm (excluding 12pm – 1pm and public holidays):
Pernod Ricard Singapore Pte Ltd
1 Kim Seng Promenade
#11-09/12 Great World City West Tower
Singapore 237994
Tel: 6235 5055
If you will be sending a representative to collect the voucher on your behalf, please provide an authorization letter and include the representative’s name, identification number and contact number.
If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> at any time.
